articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asian Stocks Start Cautious, Dollar Holds Drop: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian shares posted a modest gain as investors awaited news on trade negotiations after the US pushed for talks between President Donald Trump and China’s Xi Jinping.
articles.content:
Asian shares posted a modest gain as investors awaited news on trade negotiations after the US pushed for talks between President Donald Trump and Chinas Xi Jinping.
